com.nexmo.sdk

Class NexmoClient.NexmoClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nexmo.sdk.NexmoClient.NexmoClientBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    NexmoClient

    public static class NexmoClient.NexmoClientBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Build a new NexmoClient instance, based on the following mandatory parameters:
    • applicationContext: The application context.
    • sharedSecretKey: The pre-shared secret key generated by Nexmo, visible in your user Dashboard. This key is unique for each application registered to use the Number SDK service.
    • applicationId: The auto-generated id for the application.
    If the required parameters are not supplied an instance cannot be created, and fails by throwing a ClientBuilderException exception.

    Example usage: 

         try{
         // Create a NexmoClient using the NexmoClientBuilder.
         NexmoClient myNexmoClient = new NexmoClient.NexmoClientBuilder()
                                      .context(myAppContext)
                                      .sharedSecretKey("...")
                                      .applicationId("...")
                                      .GcmRegistrationId("...") // optional, for push integration only.
                                      .build();
     } catch (ClientBuilderException e) {
         e.printStackTrace();
     }

      • build

        public NexmoClient build()
                  throws ClientBuilderException
        Acquire a NexmoClient, based on the following mandatory parameters:
        • applicationContext: The application context.
        • sharedSecretKey: The pre-shared secret key generated by Nexmo, visible in your user Dashboard. This key is unique for each application registered to use the Number SDK service.
        • applicationId: The auto-generated id for the application.
        If the required parameters are not supplied an instance cannot be created, and fails by throwing a ClientBuilderException exception.
        Returns:
        an instance of NexmoClient.
        Throws:
        ClientBuilderException - a ClientBuilderException.
